goal: I need a plan for a workshop on legal aspects of AI agents that conduct transactions to purchase items for users.  It needs to look at 1) the contractual and general liability aspects for users, agent providers, and third party merchants that actually conduct the transactions with the user's AI agents, and 2) fiduciary duties for providers of the agents to the users who are deemed principals. The plan needs a simple scenario for the user/principal, AI agent provider (who is also the legal agent of the user/principal), and the third party merchants so participants can brainstorm the types of contractual provisions the users, agent providers, and third parties would all seek to have in place for these transactions.  The fiduciary relationship between the agent provider and the user will require corresponding contractual provisions.

success_criteria.criteria: Participants can accurately identify and describe the contractual and liability relationships between users, AI agent providers, and third-party merchants.
success_criteria.reasoning: Understanding these relationships is fundamental to addressing the legal aspects of AI transactions and forms the basis for further exploration of legal duties and responsibilities.

success_criteria.criteria: Attendees are able to articulate fiduciary duties of AI agent providers, specifically duties of loyalty and care, and explain their implications for contractual obligations.
success_criteria.reasoning: Fiduciary duties are crucial for establishing trust and legal accountability between users and AI agent providers; participants must grasp these concepts to understand their broader legal impact.

success_criteria.criteria: Participants can develop a basic scenario illustrating a transaction involving a user, an AI agent provider, and a third-party merchant, including potential contractual provisions.
success_criteria.reasoning: Scenario-based learning aids in visualizing real-world applications and helps in constructing relevant and applicable contractual clauses, ensuring concepts are not only theoretical but practical.

success_criteria.criteria: Workshop includes at least one real-world case study involving AI agents in transactions, with participants able to discuss lessons learned from the example.
success_criteria.reasoning: Case studies provide practical insights and help ground theoretical knowledge in real events, making the learning experience more relatable and memorable.

success_criteria.criteria: Participants create sample contract clauses that address key legal issues, such as authority limits and liability, demonstrating understanding through group exercises.
success_criteria.reasoning: Creating contract clauses requires applying learned knowledge and ensures participants can translate theoretical understanding into usable legal documents.
